name: Raspberry-Tarragon Vinegar
keywords: fall, summer, low-fat, raspberries, tarragon, white wine vinegar
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup fresh tarragon leaves and stems, bruised slightly

recipeInstructions.text: Place the vinegar in a nonreactive saucepan over low heat until warm. Place the raspberries and tarragon in a sterilized, wide-mouthed jar. Pour in the warm vinegar. Seal tight. Let stand in a warm place for two weeks.

Strain the vinegar, pressing the raspberries firmly. Place in a nonreactive saucepan with the honey and bring to a boil. Lower the heat and simmer for 10 minutes. Pour into a sterilized bottle and seal with a new cork. Keep refrigerated.
